com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.db
Class Column

java.lang.Object
  com.viaoa.ds.jdbc.db.Column

public class Column
extends java.lang.Object

Used for mapping database Columns with OAObject properties. Column objects are stored in Table.columns[].
